modes.headline: Apps that feel like docs.
modes.body: Daily workspace for doing real work. Navigate cards, chat with AI, connect data across apps. This is where you live—working with your applications, not building them.

modes.headline: IDE that lives on the web.
modes.body: When you need to modify software, tap into the power of a full IDE built in. AI tracks your context automatically—code navigation, schema visualization, debugging—without loading your entire codebase.

modes.headline: Live the moment you publish.
modes.body: Share instantly. No pipelines, no deploys, no DevOps. Set permissions, claim domains, update in real-time. Recipients see your work the second you hit publish.

attributes.headline: One environment that unifies how you create, build, and share anything.
attributes.subheadline: Boxel unifies chat, code editing, vibe coding, and hosting into one self-contained environment. Same files, same data, same system—just different lenses for different type of work. Switch modes, not apps.
